original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā purāṇarājorodhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarā purāṇa rājorodhā bhikkhunīsu pabbajitā hoti

original: Aññatarā bhikkhunī anabhiratiyā pīḷitā yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: aññatarā bhikkhunī anabhiratiyā pīḷitā yena sā bhikkhunī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhunim etat avoca
rājā khalu ayye tumhe cirāciram gacchati

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā bhikkhuniyā jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ācikkhi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassāḥ bhikkhuniyāḥ jatumaṭṭhakam ācikkhi

original: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ādiyitvā dhovituṁ vissaritvā ekamantaṁ chaḍḍesi.
analyzed: atha kho sā bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakam ādiyitvā dhovitum vissaritvā ekamantam chaḍḍesi
bhikkhuniyaḥ makkhikāhi samparikiṇṇam passitvā evam āhasu

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakam ādiyissati iti pe
saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakam ādiyati iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakaṁ ādiyissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhunī jatumaṭṭhakam ādiyissati
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
jatu mayam kaṭṭha mayam piṭṭha mayam mattikā maya

original: samphassaṁ sādiyantī antamaso uppalapattampi muttakaraṇaṁ paveseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: samphassam sādiyantī antamasaḥ uppala pattam pi mutta karaṇam paveseti āpatti pācittiyassa
